description: This classic vintage watch face is a true eye-candy on your smartwatch.This watch face is a stylish interpretation of a classical vintage watchface combined with modern functions of Android Wear.Key features:- Looks like a real clock;- Clean and simplistic design;- Adjust face brightness independent from the device brightness;- Choose between classic and smooth seconds movement;This watch face is compatible with round watches such as:- Moto 360- LG G Watch RIt can also be installed on rectangular smartwatches such as:- LG G Watch- Samsung Gear Live- Sony SmartWatch- ASUS ZenWatchFeel free to give us your feedback by mail or comments on the market to help us improve this app.
descriptionHTML:
This classic vintage watch face is a true eye-candy on your smartwatch.
This watch face is a stylish interpretation of a classical vintage watchface combined with modern functions of Android Wear.

Key features:
- Looks like a real clock;
- Clean and simplistic design;
- Adjust face brightness independent from the device brightness;
- Choose between classic and smooth seconds movement;

This watch face is compatible with round watches such as:
- Moto 360
- LG G Watch R

It can also be installed on rectangular smartwatches such as:
- LG G Watch
- Samsung Gear Live
- Sony SmartWatch
- ASUS ZenWatch

Feel free to give us your feedback by mail or comments on the market to help us improve this app.
comments: App keept crashing sorry no good
No Beautiful, but not on a square watch. Also, the sleep screen is almost unreadable and very unattractive.
At first sight it's beautiful but shortly u understand it is fake!
